name: 2 Buttons (Tchuris)
description:
Two buttons is the first game I ever released in a GameJam! 

Is about being able to guess the right button to click and do it as fast as you can!

My voice will help you or maybe not :)

The game is also good for practicing your aim (if you play any first person shooter).

Good luck and have fun! 

Made for the United Game Jam 2020.
Images from pixabay.com; Sounds from freemusicarchive.org; Fonts from dafont.com.
